title.en: Merched y Wawr West Glamorgan Area Fun Sports Event
title.cy: Chwaraeon Hwyl Merched y Wawr Rhanbarth Gorllewin Morgannwg

description.en:
Chwaraeon Hwyl Merched y Wawr Rhanbarth Gorllewin Morgannwg diwedd y 1980au.  Ymhlith yr aelodau mae:-
Cangen Clydach (bibiau gwyrdd) – Heulwen Hunt, Ann Thomas, Sera Harries, Joyce Jones
Cangen Gorseinon (du) – Sue Leyshon, Janet Richards, Cathy Irons, Gwen Evans, Catrin Stevens, Ann Easter, Bethan Edwards
description.cy:
